meanings.definition: A smaller division or branch of a larger commission.
meanings.sent1: The subcommission focused on environmental issues within the city.
meanings.sent2: The subcommission presented their findings to the main commission for approval.
meanings.sent3: The subcommission meeting was so small, they all fit in one room!
meanings.sent4: The subcommission was like a tiny puzzle piece in the larger picture of the organization.
meanings.sent5: The subcommission's role was crucial in handling local matters efficiently.

meanings.definition: To establish or appoint a subcommission for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The council decided to subcommission a team to investigate the issue.
meanings.sent2: They subcommissioned a group of experts to conduct the research.
meanings.sent3: I subcommissioned my friends to help me plan the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The company subcommissioned a task force to improve productivity.
meanings.sent5: She subcommissioned the project to ensure it was completed on time.
